segments.text: Do you have anything in particular that you would like our firm to take into account ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , my house is far away from here . May I ask for an apartment ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem . We will offer you a room with one bedroom and a kitchen ..
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's great . Thank you so much .
segments.speaker: S2
